parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1 </name>=<value> GUI Control

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Sets progress position of a progress bar ([[CT_PROGRESS]]).

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> control '''progressSetPosition''' pos

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> control: [[Control]] - progress bar control

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> pos: [[Number]] - 0: no progress; 1: full progress

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_control [[progressSetPosition]] 0.5</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>[[with]] [[uiNamespace]] [[do]] {
	bar = [[findDisplay]] 46 [[ctrlCreate]] ["RscProgress", -1]; 
	bar [[ctrlSetPosition]] [0,0,1,0.01]; 
	bar [[ctrlCommit]] 0;
	bar [[progressSetPosition]] 0.75; 
};</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[progressPosition]], [[ctrlSetScrollValues]], [[sliderSetPosition]]
</value></part></template>


<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma2</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>

<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>tkoh</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
